Text:
@bruss.aka.durka9 

Procname value not found on command line or in rev.ini. Please edit the file

to Cyb3rSick0
You use old game-build. You must download and install new-generation game-build: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8380094 . Update from older builds not available yet.

to Cyb3rSick0
Or you can run updater, then add to rev.ini (placed in game-dir) strings:
[Loader]
ProcName = hl2.exe -steam -game cstrike -appid 240 -novid
